name: Project E.A.R.T.H.
description:
Seth Peterson is just a normal guy. Or, he was a normal guy. One day, while he was heading home from work, he met a strange girl who told him to run. On the same day, he was kidnapped by some agents that might have been with the government? Why did they kidnap him? Who is that strange girl? What is Curia, and what is Project E.A.R.T.H.? And why won't anyone tell him anything?!

Project E.A.R.T.H. is a tale of betrayal, of rebellion, and of secrets kept for 2000 years. Seth didn't want to know these secrets; all he ever wanted was to go home. But after what he's learned, his life will never be normal again.
